org.springframework.boot.web.servlet

Interface ErrorPageRegistry

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ConfigurableEmbeddedServletContainer
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractConfigurableEmbeddedServletContainer, AbstractEmbeddedServletContainerFactory, ErrorPageFilter, JettyEmbeddedServletContainerFactory, TomcatEmbeddedServletContainerFactory, UndertowEmbeddedServletContainerFactory

    public interface ErrorPageRegistry
    Interface for a registry that holds ErrorPages.
    Since:
    1.4.0
    Author:
    Phillip Webb

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addErrorPages(ErrorPage... errorPages)
      Adds error pages that will be used when handling exceptions.
